af system points: Face Detection, 1-point AF (fixed to centre or Face Select and Track)
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries (NB4-300) (Alkalines supplied)
battery life:
Approx. 140 shots (with supplied batteries)¹
Approx. 400 shots (with optional Canon NB4-300 batteries)¹
Approx. 420 min. playback (with supplied batteries)
Approx. 600 min. playback (with Canon NB4-300 batteries)
¹ Using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera, except where indicated
closest focusing distance: 1cm (W) from front of lens in macro
continuous shooting: Approx. 1.3 shots/sec.¹ AF/LV: Approx. 0.8 shots/sec.¹ (until memory card becomes full)²

¹ Under conditions where the flash does not fire
² Depending on memory card speed / capacity
flash exposure compensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Face Detection FE. Safety FE.
menu languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (traditional), Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Ukrainian, Romanian
metering modes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (Centre)
modes: Auto, Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, Portrait, Landscape, Night Snapshot, Kids & Pets, Stitch Assist, Movie, Special Scene (Night Scene, Indoor, Foliage, Snow, Beach, Fireworks, Aquarium)
movie length: ¹ Depending on memory card speed / capacity
my camera: Start-up image and camera sounds customisation (Pre-Installed items only)
photo effects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Custom Color(Limited))
power supply battery chargers: AC Adapter Kit ACK800, Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300
still image type: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
zoom:
¹ Depending on the image size selected
² Digital zoom available for still image and standard movie modes only. Optical zoom may not be available during movie recording
